item.description:
The lazy days of summer are over!

The family, friends and holiday-oriented events kick off this month with Rosh Hashanah, and last through January. Whew!

This is a great time to pick one clutter area and tackle it once and for all. To learn how, we will call on the friendly folks at The Container Store - the neatest place I know!

They will show us how to develop a plan to get organized and what tolls will help keep you that way. The right system and plan can totally change your life.

On Friday, 8/29, Oprah revisited some of the season's most memorable guests. You may remember the hoarder, who had layers several feet deep of stuff on every surface. Her house was unbelieveable. It took over 100 people months to get rid of the clutter. Now, many months later, the Oprah show paid a surprise visit (with cameras) to see how she was doing. The house was immaculate! The former hoarder was now a black belt organizer, thanks to a system she could follow. She radiated joy in showing people around her lovely clean home - down the sock drawer, sorted by color and neatly rolled.

I figure if she can do it, so can we. Come listen as the experts share their ideas, systems, tips and tricks.

We'll meet at 7 PM on Tuesday, September 23 at the Chestnut Hill location off Route 9. There is plenty of free parking.

Hope to see you there!

Best,

Marilyn
